name: STOMP (MatthewTee)
description:
STOMP is a PvP fighting platformer where the goal is to 'stomp' your opponent's head. This version includes 6 stages and only supports up to two players in Local Multiplayer.

Other than your regular left, right, jumping movements, you are able to wall climb, wall jump, and dash.

Press Space or Cross/A (gamepad) to jump.

Press Shift or Circle/B (gamepad) to dash.
